channel.title: Colourscape Official Client!
channel.description:
Hello everyone and welcome to my official release of my new server. It's called Colourscape.
Here are some nice features of Colourscape!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9rPxh1W.png[/img] Edited home area/npc's that are there.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aVzmC5z.png[/img] New shops/new items!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/f2x0mmy.png[/img] All stats working!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PweMHwn.png[/img] Added both Completionist and Max cape!
Join now download the client! http://uppit.com/g1ceq77b07ry/client.jar
Staff spots are open! Join quick!

item.title: Colourscape Official Client!
item.dc:creator: @purple123ftw purple123ftw
item.description:
@purple123ftw wrote:

Loveandpower:

What is the skull skill? killing? Under the assumption that is the replacement for pvp?

Yeah the skull skill is a pking level!

Read full topic
